text.data-name: Incentivize people to visit wineries and wine events.
text.tspan: Incentivize people to visit wineries and wine

text.data-name: Help users learn more about wine
text.tspan: Help users learn more about wine

text.data-name: Make it easy for people to discover wine events that they may be interested in.
text.tspan: Make it easy for people to discover wine
events that they may be interested in.

text.data-name: Q: With this application available, how would you rate the probability of you attending a winery or wine event.
text.tspan: Q: With this application available, how
would you rate the probability of you
attending a winery or wine event.

text.data-name: Q: With this application available, how would you rate the ease of discovering wine events
text.tspan: Q: With this application available, how
would you rate the ease of discovering wine

text.data-name: Q: As you use the application more, do you think it will help you gradually learn more about wine ?
text.tspan: Q: As you use the application more, do you
think it will help you gradually learn more
